import socket
import threading

PROXY_HOST = '127.0.0.1'
PROXY_PORT = 8081

def handle_client(client_socket):
    request = client_socket.recv(4096)
    print("=== HTTP Request Received ===")
    print(request.decode('utf-8', errors='replace'))
    print("=============================")
    client_socket.close()
